Title: Episode 121 - A .NET Discussion with Isaac Levin
Description: .NET Developer Advocate at AWS Isaac Levin and Jamie Taylor cover a wide range of topics that are essential to any tech professional. They discuss the importance of focusing on business value, using existing tools and libraries, the need to support open source projects, and the need for technology to be more navigable. They also delve into the role of developer advocacy and how it can act as a routing mechanism to help customers get answers. With both of their decades of experience in the technology world, this is an insightful journey into the world of tech
